meta_description: The Autry is a museum dedicated to bringing together the stories of all peoples of the American West, connecting the past with the present to inspire our shared future. The museum presents a wide range of exhibitions and public programs, including lectures, film, theater, festivals, family events, and music, and performs scholarship, research, and educational outreach.
hours_text:
# Visit

## **MUSEUM AND STORE HOURS**

  * **Tuesday-Friday:** 10 a.m.–4 p.m.
  * **Saturday–Sunday:** 10 a.m.–5 p.m.
  * **Monday:** Closed

* * *

## **MUSEUM ADMISSION**

  * **Adults:** $19
  * **Students and Seniors (ages 62+):** $14
  * **Children (ages 3-12):** $8
  * **Autry Members:** Free
  * **Active-Duty U.S. Military/Veterans:** Free
  * **Children (ages 2 and under):** Free

[BUY TICKETS NOW](https://feverup.com/m/405559?thm=7098) [Become an Autry Member](/join-give/become-member "Become an Autry Member. Join or renew today!")

* * *

### **FREE HOURS**

  * **Tuesday-Wednesday:** 1-4 p.m.
    * Advance registration is encouraged for [**Free Hours at the Autry**](/free "Free Hours at the Autry ") as some dates may sell out.
    * Docent-led tours are not available during Free Hours. 

[Register](https://9025.blackbaudhosting.com/9025/tickets?tab=3&txobjid=c2abc44e-4112-4cd4-a3a3-174cd59d298d)

* * *

### **AUTRY AFTER HOURS**

Join the Autry on select weekday evenings as we open our doors at night from 6 to 9 p.m.! Explore the galleries, grab a drink and a bite to eat, and discover emerging and established artists, musicians, poets, writers, and more who represent the varied and unique communities in and around Los Angeles. Grab your friends, families, and neighbors and discover Autry After Hours! 

[Autry After Hours Event Series](https://theautry.org/events/autry-after-hours)

* * *

## **HOLIDAYS**

  * ### **Open Mondays on:**

    * **Martin Luther King Jr...
